Verification Result: P0304 Code - Cylinder #4 Misfire. Further tests found good compression, good spark to spark plug, and spark plug in good condition. However P0131 02 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage (Bank I Sensor I).
Verification Hint: The MIL light indicates the PCM has identified a problem in the systems it monitors.
Identification Tests: Test waveform pattern of fuel injector on labscope.
Identification Result: Waveform shows good #4 Injector open and close signal but injector stuck closed/not opening.
Identification Hint: Since the compression and ignition system appear to be fine, what delivers fuel to that cylinder?
Rectification Result: Well done! You have identified the fault and corrected it.
Rectification Hint: Since the injector has a good waveform, but is not opening, what needs component needs to be replaced?
